title: Resources and Recommendations
description: Find general and sector-specific guidance, resources and recommendations. This content is updated often so please check back regularly to ensure you have the most recent versions. All documents include their last updated date for reference. Some materials are available in additional languages. You can filter the results by using the language dropdown.
cleaned_text: Find general and sector-specific guidance, resources and recommendations. This content is updated often so please check back regularly to ensure you have the most recent versions. All documents include their last updated date for reference. Some materials are available in additional languages. You can filter the results by using the language dropdown. General Group Settings and Services Public Water Systems and Wastewater Please visit the Office of Drinking Water page for current guidance. Please visit the Wastewater Management page for current guidance. View our partner toolkit, featuring Department of Health social marketing campaign materials like videos, social media graphics, and print materials. Campaign topics include COVID-19, COVID-19 vaccine, WA Notify, and flu. Please use any of these materials to help with your own outreach efforts. In addition to our partner toolkit, we have additional resources and educational materials in 36 or more languages in the various drop down categories on this page. [Masks Guidance During COVID-19 (PDF)](/sites/default/files/legacy/Documents/1600/coronavirus/ClothFacemasks.pdf) [Additional Languages](#collapse-13177)This translated content contains outdated information and will be updated soon.
